{"id":481168142,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1618535414,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/481168142/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        string str=\"\";\n        int m=s.size();\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            if(isalpha(s[i])){\n                str+=tolower(s[i]);\n            }\n            else if(isdigit(s[i])){\n                str+=s[i];\n            }\n        }\n        m=str.size();\n        for(int i=0;i<(m+1)/2;i++){\n            if(str[i]!=str[m-i-1]){\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
